Get Out The Vote Weekend Phone Banks

Saturday, October 31 to
Monday, November 2
12 to 2 p.m.

Register Now

Please note: This link will take you to a third-party website, zoom.us.

{include "default_salutation"} –

Election Day is a week away, and the issues on the ballot could reshape California for years to come. Racial and gender equity, economic justice, voting rights, online privacy – it's all on the line.

See our complete voter guide before you cast your vote.

For instance, we're voting:

  • YES on Proposition 15 to reclaim $12 billion each year for schools and critical local services by closing corporate commercial property tax loopholes.
  • YES on Proposition 16 to ensure equal access to good jobs, good wages, and quality schools – no matter your race or gender.
  • NO on Proposition 20 to stop police associations from ratcheting up the criminalization and oppression of Black and brown Californians.

If you are looking to do more or can't vote this election, join us to get out the vote through Election Day. Please note: This link will take you to a third-party website, zoom.us.

Already, California voters have shattered records with millions who have submitted their ballots. We need you to ensure every eligible voter who shares our values votes through the entire ballot, from the presidential race to state and local measures.

Calling is a proven, impactful way to connect with voters one-on-one. Every vote counts. Take action and sign up for a phone bank between now and November 3. Please note: This link will take you to a third-party website, zoom.us.

In community,

ACLU of {affiliate_name}
